description: This file defines the Goal class, representing a financial goal with attributes such as id, name, target amount, current amount, and an optional target date. It includes serialization methods for JSON conversion.

classes.name: Goal
classes.description: A data model class representing a financial goal with fields for id, name, target amount, current amount, and optional target date.

methods.name: Goal.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a Goal instance from a JSON map, parsing fields including optional targetDate.

methods.name: Goal.toJson
methods.description: Converts the Goal instance into a JSON map with all relevant fields.
